features.name: Lead Search Orchestration
features.description: Parse prompt into DSL, run search job, poll results, manage cache and recent searches.

features.name: Enriched-Only Search Mode
features.description: Optional mode to return only enriched, high-confidence leads (max 20). Includes new Supabase function and UI toggle.

features.name: Website Analysis
features.description: Analyze website content for signals and insights; store artifacts.

features.name: UI: Dashboard and Results
features.description: Dashboard, search panel, virtualized table, lead detail with evidence tab scaffold.

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Supabase client, auth hooks, and edge function communication.
